title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Mar 10th thru Mar
description:
Here we are again my friends! Nine more broadcasts of C2C for all you freaks out there. Download, SEED, and Enjoy! Thanks in advance to the seeders and I will be here again next week. Thanks again Coasties! Until next week.... Stokeman Out......

Monday March 10th, 2008
Canadian UFO Sightings
Writer and pilot Don Ledger discussed Canadian UFO sightings including the Shag Harbour Incident of 1967. In his book Maritime UFO Files, he documents 135 of the best UFO cases from the east coast of Canada dating as far back as 1796. The 1796 episode... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Don Ledger, Rachael Herpel

Tuesday March 11th, 2008
Water, Vaccines & Pharmaceuticals
Dr. Len Horowitz spoke about vaccine toxicity, the pharmaceutical industry, and bioterrorism, and also touched on the healing properties of water. The "American medical cultÃƒÂ¢??ure" has created an "Rx-Generation" where it&#039;s considered normal to take a pill... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Dr. Leonard Horowitz, Whitley Strieber, Sean David Morton

Wednesday March 12th, 2008
Earth: Extinctions & Climate
Appearing during the first three hours, Prof. Peter Ward, the author of Under a Green Sky, discussed his latest work on hydrogen sulfide extinctions, and how we are creating the circumstances for extinctions in the future. His research has connected... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Peter Ward

Thursday March 13th, 2008
Medicine & the Supernatural
Brain Surgeon Dr. Allan Hamilton discussed his experiences with spirituality and the supernatural and how they are manifested in the lives of patients. In one case, a woman with a brain aneurism was placed on a heart/lung machine during surgery, and... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Dr. Allan J. Hamilton, Marc Salem

Friday March 14th, 2008
&#039;Disappearance&#039; Stories
During Open Lines, George offered a special &#039;disappearance&#039; line for callers who have seen things that have later vanished. Kristine in Cleveland recalled a haunted tour through Mansfield&#039;s Reformatory, where she thought she saw an "actor in a black cape"... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Maryanna Korwitts

Saturday March 15th, 2008
Mysteries of Ireland
Publisher of Mysterious World, Doug Elwell discussed his recent work on the mysteries of Ireland including fairies, giants and an analysis of the writings of Tolkien. More details forthcoming...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Doug Elwell, Deborah J. Palfrey

Sunday March 16th, 2008
Inside the Mafia
In his very first radio interview, mafia associate turned government operative Tony Nastasi spoke with George Knapp (email) about his life inside the mob. As a youngster, Nastasi said he did occasional work for Joey Gallo in New York, and later graduated... 
Host: George Knapp
Guest(s): Tony Nastasi

Monday March 17th, 2008
Planet X and Sumerian Tales
Researchers Jason Martell and Erik Poltorak (Parker) shared their expertise in Sumerian history, ET visitations and modern and ancient reports of Planet X. Appearing in the 2nd hour, Martell noted the recent findings of Japanese astronomers at Kobe... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Jason Martell, Erik Poltorak, Gerald Celente

Tuesday March 18th, 2008
Plants, Bio-Communication, & Memory
Scientist and researcher Gerald Epling discussed his work on plants and bio-communication. He&#039;s been able to replicate and extend the experiments of Cleve Backster, measuring the responses of one life form to another. Epling&#039;s experiments have shown... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Gerald Epling, Richard C. Hoagland
